channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Not swept, 16th August
item.description:
Not swept
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): North Cray Road, North Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pot hole cracks and loose drain tops, 16th August
item.description:
All day and night until the last bus runs, my house rattles to the bus schedule so every 10 mins all day, going both ways .have been reporting this for two years yet nothing done, Westwood lane has had new surface and not hook lane. Please take a look and don’t close the case again without looking into it. We all pay our taxes. This is keeping us up at night . The vibrations rattle glasses in the kitchen cuboard at the back of the house
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hook Lane, Blackfen, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Raised paving slab at end of front path (No 3), 16th August
item.description:
There is a raised paving slab at the end of our front path (number 3). It’s been there approximately 6 months, but now getting worse and is a trip hazard (our 3 year daughter has nearly tripped on it a couple of times) Please can this be remedied? Many thanks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Marlowes, Crayford, London
